name: variable

labels.vertical_integral_of_eastward_water_vapo: Vertical integral of eastward water vapour flux
labels.vertical_integral_of_northward_latent_he: Vertical integral of northward  latent heat flux
labels.vertical_integral_of_northward_total_ene: Vertical integral of northward total energy flux
labels.vertical_integral_of_northward_water_vap: Vertical integral of northward water vapour flux
labels.tendency_of_vertical_integral_of_latent_: Tendency of vertical integral of  latent heat
labels.tendency_of_vertical_integral_of_water_v: Tendency of vertical integral of  water vapour
labels.tendency_of_vertical_integral_of_total_e: Tendency of vertical integral of  total energy

name: area_group
help: Select one widget from the choice below
label: Geographical area

details.information: With this option selected the entire available area will be provided

name: area
label: Sub-region extraction
help: Select a sub-region of the available area by providing its limits on latitude and longitude
